p: Besides elevated CPH validation indexes, literature data (not geo-referenced and therefore not used in the model) also record M. harttii in areas indicated by the model as suitable for the species, such as the southern portion of the Abrolhos bank (Esp√≠rito Santo State) [ 94]. A model that fails to omit known points of presence is less accurate than those predicting unknown inhabited areas [ 95]. These unknown areas provide a precise representation of the spatial extent of habitable conditions for the species [ 82].
